00137   class PDFSetInfo {
00138   public:
00139     std::string file;
00140     std::string description;
00141     int id; 
00142     int pdflibNType, pdflibNGroup, pdflibNSet;
00143     int memberId;
00144     double lowx, highx;
00145     double lowQ2, highQ2;
00146 
00148     std::string toString() const {
00149       std::ostringstream os;
00150       os << "PDF set #" << id 
00151          << " {" 
00152          << " file='" << file << "',"
00153          << " description='" << description << "',"
00154          << " x = ["  << lowx  << ", " << highx << "],"
00155          << " Q2 = [" << lowQ2 << ", " << highQ2 << "]"
00156          << " }";
00157       return os.str();
00158     }
00159   };
00160 
00161 
00162   inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const PDFSetInfo& info) {
00163     os << info.toString();
00164     return os;
00165   }
